title: MegMeg☆Singer Song Fighter
original_name: メグメグ ☆ シンガーソングファイター
sinopse:
This is the (imaginary) beginning story of the crazy popular Vocaloid Character GUMI!! By some freak incident, the now-cyborg schoolgirl has her eyes set on her idol debut as "Gumi" under the mysterious organization, "Intane Group"!?

(Source: ComicWalker)
